summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the purchase of easements for sanitary sewer purposes over and across certain property in Block 13, Cottage Grove Addition No. 3, Block 2, Southern Pacific Supplemental Addition to West Seattle, Block 4, Southern Pacific Addition to West Seattle, and Block 4, Faegre's First Addition to West Seattle required for the 21st Avenue Southwest Sanitary Sewer Project, and for the necessary expenses of the Engineering Department in connection therewith, and making an appropriation from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund therefor.
